meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6ES Council Briefing Room and Videoconference

presenters: Lori Trulson, Senior Environmental Coordinator, Office of Environmental Quality & Sustainability
Carlos Evans, Director, Office of Environmental Quality & Sustainability
Natalie Requenez, Environmental Justice Coordinator, Office of Environmental Quality & Sustainability

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of minutes from the December 13, 2023 meeting.

agenda_items.title: Environmental Due Diligence (EDD) & Municipal Setting Designation (MSD) Programs Overview
agenda_items.description: Overview of the EDD and MSD programs presented by Lori Trulson.

agenda_items.title: Updated CECAP Considerations for 2024 Bond Program
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the integration of CECAP into the 2024 Bond Program presented by Carlos Evans and Natalie Requenez.

agenda_items.title: Consideration of Approval of Environmental Commission FY23 Annual Report
agenda_items.description: Review and approval of the annual report.
